publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty, anno Dom. 1679. And re-printed at London, for Andrew Forrester, in King-street, Westminster,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edinbugh [sic], the fourteenth day of Angust [sic], one thousand six hundred seventy and nine years. And of our reign, the thretty[sic] one year.
Arms 85; Steele notation: Purse- and Signet,.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
